about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho rank 15 ECM interceptor “Caltrop”
  • Active module Stasis mine
  • Special title “Bounty hunter” — this pilot specializes in eliminating specific targets. He searches and destroys dangerous opponents to eliminate the threat.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Magnetic mine” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Peter Riviera”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

Do you want to be on top of the combat encounters? The “Caltrop” ship is exactly what you need! This is a unique project of Jericho, created as a new generation autonomous system for radio-electronic warfare. The integrated technologies of the Alien provide it with a tremendous advantage over other ships. And it is also assembled directly in Jericho’s hangars and customized to the individual needs of every pilot! The “Caltrop” ship has a unique weapon power supply system, which is perfectly combined with plasma weapons. DOn’t miss the opportunity to become invincible in battle — choose “Caltrop”!

name: Star Conflict - Caltrop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 15 ECM interceptor “Caltrop”Active module Stasis mineSpecial title “Bounty hunter” — this pilot specializes in eliminating specific targets. He searches and destroys dangerous opponents to eliminate the threat.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
